page.title: 10THE ARMY
page.content: My Dad is in the Army. He is a member of{29 Commando Regiment,}stationed in Plymouth. He has just been promoted to sergeant. I live in a{maisonette}built especially for{soldiers'}families. There are about 24 families in the block, which is part of the 'married man's quarters'. My Dad takes the men of his regiment on exercise to Norway every year. Two years ago he went to fight in the{Falklands conflict.}One of his friends got shot in the arm and had to stay in hospital. Dad brought me back two bullets for my necklace. When he goes away it is usually for a long time - about six months. Whilst he is away my family miss him a lot and worry about him. Some of my friends' dads are usually away at the same time.
